00034 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::BlockCompressionCodecZlib(const Args &args) : m_inflate_initialized(false), m_deflate_initialized(false), m_level(Z_BEST_SPEED) {
00035   if (!args.empty())
00036     set_args(args);
00037 }

00044 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::~BlockCompressionCodecZlib() {
00045   if (m_deflate_initialized)
00046     deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00047   if (m_inflate_initialized)
00048     inflateEnd(&m_stream_inflate);
00049 }

00053 int BlockCompressionCodecZlib::set_args(const Args &args) {
00054   Args::const_iterator it = args.begin(), arg_end = args.end();
00055 
00056   for (; it != arg_end; ++it) {
00057     if (*it == "--best" || *it == "-9") {
00058       m_level = Z_BEST_COMPRESSION;
00059       if (m_deflate_initialized) {
00060         deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00061         m_deflate_initialized = false;
00062       }
00063     }
00064     else if (*it == "--normal") {
00065       m_level = Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION;
00066       if (m_deflate_initialized) {
00067         deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00068         m_deflate_initialized = false;
00069       }
00070     }
00071     else {
00072       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized argument to Zlib codec: '%s'", (*it).c_str());
00073       return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_INVALID_ARG;
00074     }
00075   }
00076   return Error::OK;
00077 }

00084 int BlockCompressionCodecZlib::deflate(const DynamicBuffer &input, DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header, size_t reserve) {
00085   uint32_t avail_out = input.fill() + 6 + (((input.fill() / 16000) + 1 ) * 5);  // see http://www.zlib.net/zlib_tech.html
00086 
00087   if (!m_deflate_initialized) {
00088     memset(&m_stream_deflate, 0, sizeof(m_stream_deflate));
00089     m_stream_deflate.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00090     m_stream_deflate.zfree = Z_NULL;
00091     m_stream_deflate.opaque = Z_NULL;
00092     int ret = deflateInit(&m_stream_deflate, m_level);
00093     assert(ret == Z_OK);
00094     (void)ret;
00095     m_deflate_initialized = true;
00096   }
00097 
00098   output.clear();
00099   output.reserve( header.length() + avail_out + reserve );
00100 
00101   m_stream_deflate.avail_in = input.fill();
00102   m_stream_deflate.next_in = input.base;
00103 
00104   m_stream_deflate.avail_out = avail_out;
00105   m_stream_deflate.next_out = output.base + header.length();
00106 
00107   int ret = ::deflate(&m_stream_deflate, Z_FINISH); 
00108   assert(ret == Z_STREAM_END);
00109   (void)ret;
00110 
00111   uint32_t zlen = avail_out - m_stream_deflate.avail_out;
00112 
00113   /* check for an incompressible block */
00114   if (zlen >= input.fill()) {
00115     header.set_compression_type(NONE);
00116     memcpy(output.base+header.length(), input.base, input.fill());
00117     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00118     header.set_data_zlength(input.fill());
00119   }
00120   else {
00121     header.set_compression_type(ZLIB);
00122     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00123     header.set_data_zlength(zlen);
00124   }
00125 
00126   header.set_data_checksum( fletcher32(output.base + header.length(), header.get_data_zlength()) );
00127   
00128   deflateReset(&m_stream_deflate);
00129 
00130   output.ptr = output.base;
00131   header.encode(&output.ptr);
00132   output.ptr += header.get_data_zlength();
00133 
00134   return Error::OK;
00135 }

00137 
00141 int BlockCompressionCodecZlib::inflate(const DynamicBuffer &input, DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header) {
00142   int ret;
00143   int error;
00144   uint8_t *msg_ptr = input.base;
00145   size_t remaining = input.fill();
00146 
00147   if (!m_inflate_initialized) {
00148     memset(&m_stream_inflate, 0, sizeof(m_stream_inflate));
00149     m_stream_inflate.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00150     m_stream_inflate.zfree = Z_NULL;
00151     m_stream_inflate.opaque = Z_NULL;
00152     m_stream_inflate.avail_in = 0;
00153     m_stream_inflate.next_in = Z_NULL;
00154     int ret = inflateInit(&m_stream_inflate);
00155     assert(ret == Z_OK);
00156     (void)ret;
00157     m_inflate_initialized = true;
00158   }
00159 
00160   if ((error = header.decode(&msg_ptr, &remaining)) != Error::OK)
00161     return error;
00162 
00163   if (header.get_data_zlength() != remaining) {
00164     HT_ERRORF("Block decompression error, header zlength = %d, actual = %d", header.get_data_zlength(), remaining);
00165     return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER;
00166   }
00167 
00168   uint32_t checksum = fletcher32(msg_ptr, remaining);
00169   if (checksum != header.get_data_checksum()) {
00170     HT_ERRORF("Compressed block checksum mismatch header=%d, computed=%d", header.get_data_checksum(), checksum);
00171     return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_CHECKSUM_MISMATCH;
00172   }
00173 
00174   output.reserve(header.get_data_length());
00175 
00176    // check compress bit
00177   if (header.get_compression_type() == NONE)
00178     memcpy(output.base, msg_ptr, header.get_data_length());
00179   else {
00180 
00181     m_stream_inflate.avail_in = remaining;
00182     m_stream_inflate.next_in = msg_ptr;
00183 
00184     m_stream_inflate.avail_out = header.get_data_length();
00185     m_stream_inflate.next_out = output.base;
00186 
00187     ret = ::inflate(&m_stream_inflate, Z_NO_FLUSH);
00188     if (ret != Z_STREAM_END) {
00189       HT_ERRORF("Compressed block inflate error (return value = %d)", ret);
00190       goto abort;
00191     }
00192 
00193     if (m_stream_inflate.avail_out != 0) {
00194       HT_ERRORF("Compressed block inflate error, expected %d but only inflated to %d bytes", header.get_data_length(), header.get_data_length()-m_stream_inflate.avail_out);
00195       goto abort;
00196     }
00197     ::inflateReset(&m_stream_inflate);  
00198   }
00199 
00200   output.ptr = output.base + header.get_data_length();
00201 
00202   return Error::OK;
00203 
00204  abort:
00205   ::inflateReset(&m_stream_inflate);
00206   output.free();
00207   return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_INFLATE_ERROR;
00208 }
